full_summary:
================================

## EP916-240079 Office Seating Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to respond to a solicitation for the provision of office seating products. This requirement falls under the General Stream for product category 1, with the goal of purchasing and installing office seating in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4031943080
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: May 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 15, 2023 (at 14:00:00 hours)
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 5, 2023
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Process

This tender is conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement and follows a Competitive – Open Bidding process. The lowest price will be the selection criterion. Bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal.

### Product Category

The required product category for this tender is 56000000 – Furniture and Furnishings. Bidders must demonstrate compliance with the specified product requirements.

### Security Requirements

A security requirement is associated with this tender. Potential bidders must be prepared to address and meet the necessary security standards.

### Trade Agreements and Procurement Category

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The procurement category for this tender is Goods and Services (GD).

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Katia-Annik Torkia (SPAC/PSPC) at katia-annik.torkia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL

The notice URL for this tender can be accessed through the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16435203?extsite=MTY0MzUyMDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Tender Description

The tender description can be viewed through the notice URL above.
